faqs.question: What is Bedrock?
faqs.answer: Bedrock is an open source project focussed on improving open utility of NFTs on Terra.

faqs.question: What is the artwork?
faqs.answer: This is a project from Loonies. Coming to Terra soon!

faqs.question: How many pieces?
faqs.answer: 10 :( IPFS doesn't like large folders unfortunately
